item.title: Manual of Style
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Ralph's Manual of StyLe (RMS) is guaranteed to confuse even those with multiple Ph.D.'s. Once the publishing world turns to RMS, people will have to hire a copy editor just to interpret their TV guides for them. Ralph's Manual of Style (Link courtesy of moleskinerie)
